citations.narrative:
The feed trough for the zebu, llama, and alpaca has four areas of torn, broken plastic with sharp edges and one hole that
reveals the rusted metal rack underneath. Additionally, one vertical metal support bar has bent which is starting to expose
rough, rusted metal edges. Sharp edges and holes within a food trough can cause injury to the animals while feeding.
Correct by ensuring all housing facilities are structurally sound and maintained in good repair to protect the animals from
injury.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.125(a)  Repeat
   
Facilities, general. 
The feed trough for the zebu, llama, and alpaca has four areas of torn, broken plastic with sharp edges and one hole that 
reveals the rusted metal rack underneath. Additionally, one vertical metal support bar has bent which is starting to expose 
rough, rusted metal edges. Sharp edges and holes within a food trough can cause injury to the animals while feeding. 
Correct by ensuring all housing facilities are structurally sound and maintained in good repair to protect the animals from 
injury. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
